author: CBS News
title: Free month of CBS All Access during virus lockdown
description: Ahead of the season finale of "Star Trek: Picard," the actor said you can get a free month of the streaming service in the U.S. with the code: GIFT.
content:
"Star Trek" star Sir Patrick Stewart announced Tuesday that fans can watch "Star Trek: Picard," and other CBS shows, for free on CBS All Access until April 23. The free offer comes as millions of Americans are stuck at home amid the coronavirus outbreak.
